data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 125,426 people in the state of Sánchez Ramírez who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sánchez Ramírez, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Sánchez Ramírez to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Sánchez Ramírez
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Sánchez Ramírez, Dominican Republic so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Japanese people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Sánchez Ramírez to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Sánchez Ramírez, Dominican Republic a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Sánchez Ramírez, Dominican Republic to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.
